title: Twitter drama continues with blue-tick confusion
description: A number of executives have walked out after a turbulent launch of new Twitter features.

title: Chris Rock to host Netflix's first live show
description: The comic will front a stand-up special as Netflix begins to experiment with screening live events.

title: Australian police to Medibank hackers: "We know who you are"
description: Authorities say they know the names of cyber-criminals behind 'morally reprehensible' hack.

title: Ukraine war: Russians kept in the dark by internet search
description: Why users of Russia's top search engine are unlikely to get to the truth about the war in Ukraine.

title: Ros Atkins On… Elon Musk and Twitter
description: Ros Atkins looks at the twists and turns of Elon Musk’s early days in charge of the social media platform.

title: US regulator FTC says it is concerned about Twitter
description: The Federal Trade Commission says developments at Twitter could risk it violating regulatory orders.
